The NCERT appreciates the efforts of the Textbook Development 
Committee. Several experts and teachers have contributed towards the finalisation of this book. We are grateful to them and their institutions. I am thankful to Professor Saroj Yadav, Dean (Academic) and the Project Coordinator of the National Population Education Project (NPEP) for her continuous efforts in developing this material and bringing it to its present from.
As an organisation committed to systemic reform and continuous 
improvement in the quality of our products, the NCERT welcomes comments and suggestions from teachers and students, which will enable us to undertake further revision and refinement.
Hrushikesh Senapaty 
Director
New Delhi    National Council of Educational
May, 2020     Research and Training
